mapper.select: select a.label_id, a.label_name, a.label_class, IFNULL(b.count,0) as count from blog_labels a LEFT JOIN (SELECT label_id,count(label_id) as count from blog_article_label GROUP BY label_id) b ON a.label_id=b.label_id where label_type='article' order by label_id asc,create_time asc
select label_id, label_name, label_class from blog_labels where label_type=#{label_type} order by create_time desc
SELECT b.label_id, c.label_name, c.label_class from blog_article_label b LEFT JOIN blog_labels c ON b.label_id=c.label_id where b.article_id=#{article_id}
SELECT b.label_id, c.label_name, c.label_class from blog_user_label b LEFT JOIN blog_labels c ON b.label_id=c.label_id where b.user_id=#{user_id}
